properties.Descriptio:
Arrange stone packing-rubble packing

 Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling 
in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ 
Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m
